        public Boolean getQuietMode()
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Returns whether the logger should be quite. If the logger is quite then the output is not shown in the console log.

        Specified by:

        Returns:

        public Boolean getNoAuthors()
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Returns whether author and commit information should be omitted.
        Specified by:
        getNoAuthors in interface Settings
        Returns:
        on true the SCM will not be called to obtain author and commit information, on false author and commit information are created
